chunk:
Eucerin Hydrating Micellar Water

Brand: Eucerin

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, POLOXAMER 124, GLYCERIN, SODIUM HYALURONATE, GLYCERYL GLUCOSIDE, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, ARGININE HCI, SODIUM COCOAMPHOACETATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, TRISODIUM EDTA, SODIUM CHLORIDE

Directions: : Saturate cotton pad with Micellar water. To Remove Eye Makeup: Place pad over closed eye for few seconds, then gently wipe away makeup. To Cleanse Skin: Use AM/PM. Gently wipe over skin until no residue appears on cleansing pad. No need to rinse.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
